title: 'EXCELLENT Product ! EXCEPTIONAL Value For Money'
body: 'NO Mop on the market can do EFFECTIVELY what a Mop is MEANT to do other than this Product ! Period. What you pay for is what you get: A Fantastic Product. 1). LIGHT in weight and VERY EFFECTIVE handling - unlike MOST Mops which are so "unwieldy" -the mopping chore can be concluded very quickly with minimum exertion. 2). The Telescopic Handle is VERY easy to draw and once reinserted - the Mop can simply be hung in the bathroom 3) Unlike MOST Mops
column5: this is easy to WASH and SQUEEZE too ABSOLUTELY LOVE this Product Just Go For It !!!!'

title: 'Best mop in town'
body: 'Light weight yet sturdy. The secret is the micro fibre strips. Very easy to squeeze out. Great for small floor areas. We use it in the kitchen. A bit small for the whole house though. One drawback though; no hands free squeezer! You have to use hands.'

title: 'Excellent product!'
